title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a soft tortilla.

title: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl
description: A nutritious bowl with quinoa, mixed vegetables, feta cheese, and a balsamic vinaigrette dressing.

title: Spicy Black Bean Burger
description: A flavorful black bean patty topped with pepper jack cheese, lettuce, tomato, and spicy mayo on a whole grain bun.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze.

title: Mango Chicken Salad
description: Grilled chicken, mixed greens, mango slices, cherry tomatoes, and a citrus vinaigrette dressing.
